name: B. Plus and Multiply
statement:
There is an infinite set generated as follows: 1 is in this set. If x is
in this set, x
cdot a and x+b both are in this set. For example, when a=3 and b=6, the
five smallest elements of the set are: 1, 3 (1 is in this set, so 1
cdot a=3 is in this set), 7 (1 is in this set, so 1+b=7 is in this set),
9 (3 is in this set, so 3
cdot a=9 is in this set), 13 (7 is in this set, so 7+b=13 is in this
set). Given positive integers a, b, n, determine if n is in this set.
